rows.label: bf07370100_0010
rows.name: Everyone looked like enemies that wanted to get us.

rows.label: bf07370100_0020
rows.name: There was nothing we could do but stay on the run.

rows.label: bf07370100_0030
rows.name: Trying our best to just stay alive.

rows.label: bf07370100_0040
rows.name: Not even beliving I'd be alive the next day.

rows.label: bf07370100_0050
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf07370100_0060
rows.name: That's when I met Shin.

rows.label: bf07370100_0070
rows.name: He took me in.

rows.label: bf07370100_0080
rows.name: So that's why you and Shin...

rows.label: bf07370100_0090
rows.name: I saw my future in there.

rows.label: bf07370100_0100
rows.name:
I had no future of my own, 
so I tried to share his.

rows.label: bf07370100_0110
rows.name: But...

rows.label: bf07370100_0120
rows.name: This isn't like you at all.

rows.label: bf07370100_0130
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]What?

rows.label: bf07370100_0140
rows.name:
You're not the kind of person to worry
about stuff like that.

rows.label: bf07370100_0150
rows.name: Well, I wasn't worried, as such.

rows.label: bf07370100_0160
rows.name: Then why tell stories about the past?

rows.label: bf07370100_0170
rows.name: That's... just how the conversation flowed...

rows.label: bf07370100_0180
rows.name: Look, I don't know what's burdening you, Nia, but...

rows.label: bf07370100_0190
rows.name: Wouldn't it be better if you were more free?

rows.label: bf07370100_0200
rows.name: Free?

rows.label: bf07370100_0210
rows.name: Free and selfish.

rows.label: bf07370100_0220
rows.name:
If you think something's right, push your feelings 
through even if you have to punch someone.

rows.label: bf07370100_0230
rows.name: That's who you are, right?

rows.label: bf07370100_0240
rows.name: What the heck are you...

rows.label: bf07370100_0250
rows.name: You're making me sound like some violent woman!

rows.label: bf07370100_0260
rows.name: I think you know what I mean.

rows.label: bf07370100_0270
rows.name: What did you say?!

rows.label: bf07370100_0280
rows.name:
Ha ha ha. There we go.
That's the usual Nia.

rows.label: bf07370100_0290
rows.name: The usual... me?

rows.label: bf07370100_0300
rows.name: Let's give it one more push.

rows.label: bf07370100_0310
rows.name: Rex...
